hero.title: About United African Technical College
hero.subtitle: A Christian higher education community in Kigamboni empowering Africa through faith, character, and technical excellence.

mission: To nurture professionals of character and competence who serve Tanzania and the world with integrity, practical skill, and a Christ-centered worldview.
vision: To be a leading technical college in Africa known for excellent teaching, applied research, and community impact.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: High standards in teaching and practice.

visit.description: Kigamboni, Dar es Salaam. Reach us for campus tours, outreach visits, and events.
